mapper.select: SELECT JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, OVERHAUL_DATE AS overhaulDate, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, PHOTO_URL AS photoUrl, TERMINAL_FRONT_GLASS AS terminalFrontGlass, TERMINAL_FRONT AS terminalFront, TERMINAL_CRACKS AS terminalCracks, MONITOR AS monitor, BNKB_PART_ENTRANCE_CRACKS AS bnkbPartEntranceCracks, CARD_PART_ENTRANCE_CRACKS AS cardPartEntranceCracks, INTERCOM AS intercom, BOARD_CRADLE AS boardCradle, BRANCH_FLOOR AS branchFloor, INSIDE_WALL AS insideWall, OUTSIDE_WALL AS outsideWall, BRANCH_GLASS AS branchGlass, CEILING AS ceiling, FLUORESCENT_LIGHT AS fluorescentLight, STICKING_BILLBOARD AS stickingBillboard, GARBAGECAN AS garbagecan, COOLER_HEATER AS coolerHeater, BRANCH_PERIPHERY AS branchPeriphery FROM ATMS_05001140

SELECT JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, OVERHAUL_DATE AS overhaulDate, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, PHOTO_URL AS photoUrl, TERMINAL_FRONT_GLASS AS terminalFrontGlass, TERMINAL_FRONT AS terminalFront, TERMINAL_CRACKS AS terminalCracks, MONITOR AS monitor, BNKB_PART_ENTRANCE_CRACKS AS bnkbPartEntranceCracks, CARD_PART_ENTRANCE_CRACKS AS cardPartEntranceCracks, INTERCOM AS intercom, BOARD_CRADLE AS boardCradle, BRANCH_FLOOR AS branchFloor, INSIDE_WALL AS insideWall, OUTSIDE_WALL AS outsideWall, BRANCH_GLASS AS branchGlass, CEILING AS ceiling, FLUORESCENT_LIGHT AS fluorescentLight, STICKING_BILLBOARD AS stickingBillboard, GARBAGECAN AS garbagecan, COOLER_HEATER AS coolerHeater, BRANCH_PERIPHERY AS branchPeriphery FROM ATMS_05001140 WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, OVERHAUL_DATE = #{overhaulDate}
mapper.update: DELETE FROM ATMS_05001140 WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, OVERHAUL_DATE = #{overhaulDate}

UPDATE ATMS_05001140 SET JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, CORNER_NAME = #{cornerName}, PHOTO_URL = #{photoUrl}, TERMINAL_FRONT_GLASS = #{terminalFrontGlass}, TERMINAL_FRONT = #{terminalFront}, TERMINAL_CRACKS = #{terminalCracks}, MONITOR = #{monitor}, BNKB_PART_ENTRANCE_CRACKS = #{bnkbPartEntranceCracks}, CARD_PART_ENTRANCE_CRACKS = #{cardPartEntranceCracks}, INTERCOM = #{intercom}, BOARD_CRADLE = #{boardCradle}, BRANCH_FLOOR = #{branchFloor}, INSIDE_WALL = #{insideWall}, OUTSIDE_WALL = #{outsideWall}, BRANCH_GLASS = #{branchGlass}, CEILING = #{ceiling}, FLUORESCENT_LIGHT = #{fluorescentLight}, STICKING_BILLBOARD = #{stickingBillboard}, GARBAGECAN = #{garbagecan}, COOLER_HEATER = #{coolerHeater}, BRANCH_PERIPHERY = #{branchPeriphery} WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, OVERHAUL_DATE = #{overhaulDate}

INSERT INTO ATMS_05001140 ( JISA_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, CORNER_CODE, OVERHAUL_DATE, CORNER_NAME, PHOTO_URL, TERMINAL_FRONT_GLASS, TERMINAL_FRONT, TERMINAL_CRACKS, MONITOR, BNKB_PART_ENTRANCE_CRACKS, CARD_PART_ENTRANCE_CRACKS, INTERCOM, BOARD_CRADLE, BRANCH_FLOOR, INSIDE_WALL, OUTSIDE_WALL, BRANCH_GLASS, CEILING, FLUORESCENT_LIGHT, STICKING_BILLBOARD, GARBAGECAN, COOLER_HEATER, BRANCH_PERIPHERY ) VALUES ( #{jisaCode}, #{branchCode}, #{cornerCode}, #{overhaulDate}, #{cornerName}, #{photoUrl}, #{terminalFrontGlass}, #{terminalFront}, #{terminalCracks}, #{monitor}, #{bnkbPartEntranceCracks}, #{cardPartEntranceCracks}, #{intercom}, #{boardCradle}, #{branchFloor}, #{insideWall}, #{outsideWall}, #{branchGlass}, #{ceiling}, #{fluorescentLight}, #{stickingBillboard}, #{garbagecan}, #{coolerHeater}, #{branchPeriphery} )
